languages.text: "Закончилось? О нет, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, эта дорога далека от своего завершения!" {n}Ирлиэт почти кричит, ее голос звенит от гнева.{/n} "Но когда мы доберемся до Муарана, я заставлю его раскрыть пределы своего двуличия и рассказать, где заканчивается истина и начинается ложь!"

"Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"
languages.original_text: "Закончилось? О нет, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, эта дорога далека от своего завершения!" {n}Ирлиэт почти кричит, ее голос звенит от гнева.{/n} "Но когда мы доберемся до Муарана, я заставлю его раскрыть пределы своего двуличия и рассказать, где заканчивается истина и начинается ложь!"

traits.locale_text: "Over? Oh no, mon-keigh, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

"Over? Oh no, mon-keigh, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

"Over? Oh no, mon-keigh, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

"Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

languages.text: 「終わり？いいえ、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}、この道の終わりははるか彼方に！」{n}ユリエットは声に憤怒を響かせ、叫んでいる。{/n}「だが、ムアランの元へ着いたら、我はその不実を何もかも白状させ、どこまでが真実でどこからが嘘なのかを説明してもらう！」
languages.original_text: "Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

traits.locale_text: 「終わり？いいえ、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}、この道の終わりははるか彼方に！」{n}ユリエットは声に憤怒を響かせ、叫んでいる。{/n}「だが、ムアランの元へ着いたら、我はその不実を何もかも白状させ、どこまでが真実でどこからが嘘なのかを説明してもらう！」

languages.text: “结束？噢，不，{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}，这条路还远远没有到尽头！”{n}伊莉耶特几乎是吼出了这句话，她的声音充满了愤怒。{/n}“但是，等我们见到穆兰之后，我一定要让他把他的奸计从实招来。我要知道真相是在哪里被抹除，谎言又是从何处开始！”
languages.original_text: "Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

traits.locale_text: “结束？噢，不，{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}，这条路还远远没有到尽头！”{n}伊莉耶特几乎是吼出了这句话，她的声音充满了愤怒。{/n}“但是，等我们见到穆兰之后，我一定要让他把他的奸计从实招来。我要知道真相是在哪里被抹除，谎言又是从何处开始！”

languages.text: «¿Terminado? Oh, no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, ¡esta senda todavía está muy lejos de su final!». {n}Yrliet casi está gritando; su voz está cargada de ira.{/n} «¡Pero cuando encontremos a Muaran, le obligaré a revelar el verdadero alcance de su hipocresía y me dirá dónde termina la verdad y empiezan las mentiras!».
languages.original_text: "Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Terminado? Oh, no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, ¡esta senda todavía está muy lejos de su final!». {n}Yrliet casi está gritando; su voz está cargada de ira.{/n} «¡Pero cuando encontremos a Muaran, le obligaré a revelar el verdadero alcance de su hipocresía y me dirá dónde termina la verdad y empiezan las mentiras!».

languages.text: "Vorbei? Oh, nein, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}, das Ende dieses Pfades ist längst nicht erreicht!" {n}Yrliet schreit fast, ihre Stimme ist voller Zorn.{/n} "Aber wenn wir bei Muaran sind, werde ich ihn dazu bringen, das volle Ausmaß seines Doppelspiels zu gestehen und mir zu sagen, wo die Wahrheit endet und die Lüge beginnt!"
languages.original_text: "Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

traits.locale_text: "Vorbei? Oh, nein, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}, das Ende dieses Pfades ist längst nicht erreicht!" {n}Yrliet schreit fast, ihre Stimme ist voller Zorn.{/n} "Aber wenn wir bei Muaran sind, werde ich ihn dazu bringen, das volle Ausmaß seines Doppelspiels zu gestehen und mir zu sagen, wo die Wahrheit endet und die Lüge beginnt!"

languages.text: « Terminé ? Oh non, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, cette voie est encore loin de sa fin ! » {n}La voix d'Yrliet résonne de colère, à la limite d'un cri.{/n} « Mais quand nous aurons trouvé Muaran, je lui ferai avouer toute l'étendue de sa perfidie et je le forcerai à me dire où la vérité prend fin et où commence le mensonge ! »
languages.original_text: "Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

traits.locale_text: « Terminé ? Oh non, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, cette voie est encore loin de sa fin ! » {n}La voix d'Yrliet résonne de colère, à la limite d'un cri.{/n} « Mais quand nous aurons trouvé Muaran, je lui ferai avouer toute l'étendue de sa perfidie et je le forcerai à me dire où la vérité prend fin et où commence le mensonge ! »

languages.text: "Bitti mi? Hayır {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, yolun sonuna daha gelmedik!" {n}Yrliet'in sesinde öyle bir öfke var ki bağırmamak için kendini zor tutuyor.{/n} "Muaran'ı bulduğumuzda ikiyüzlülüğü bir kenara bırakıp bana neyin gerçek neyin aldatmaca olduğunu bir bir anlatacak!"
languages.original_text: "Over? Oh no, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, this path is far from its end!" {n}Yrliet is almost shouting, her voice ringing with fury.{/n} "But when we get to Muaran, I will make him reveal the full extent of his duplicity and tell me where the truth ends and the lies begin!"

traits.locale_text: "Bitti mi? Hayır {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, yolun sonuna daha gelmedik!" {n}Yrliet'in sesinde öyle bir öfke var ki bağırmamak için kendini zor tutuyor.{/n} "Muaran'ı bulduğumuzda ikiyüzlülüğü bir kenara bırakıp bana neyin gerçek neyin aldatmaca olduğunu bir bir anlatacak!"
